faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about Menu Crafter and how to get the most out of our platform.

q1.question: How do I create my first menu?
q1.answer: Getting started is easy! Simply sign up for an account, click 'Create New Menu', and use our intuitive drag-and-drop editor to add dishes, prices, and descriptions. You can customize colors, fonts, and layout to match your restaurant's brand.

q2.question: Can I update my menu in real-time?
q2.answer: Yes! Menu Crafter allows you to update your menu instantly. Changes are reflected immediately on your live menu, so you can add new dishes, adjust prices, or mark items as unavailable without any delay.

q3.question: Do you support multiple languages?
q3.answer: Absolutely! Menu Crafter supports multiple languages including English, French, Spanish, Arabic, Latvian, and Russian. You can create menus in different languages to serve diverse customer bases.

q4.question: How much does Menu Crafter cost?
q4.answer: We offer flexible pricing plans to suit different restaurant sizes. Start with our free plan to create up to 3 menus, or choose from our premium plans for unlimited menus and advanced features. Contact us for custom enterprise solutions.

q5.question: Can I integrate Menu Crafter with my existing systems?
q5.answer: Yes, we provide APIs and integrations with popular POS systems, restaurant management software, and online ordering platforms. Our technical team can help you set up seamless integrations.

q6.question: Is my menu data secure?
q6.answer: Security is our top priority. All menu data is encrypted and stored securely. We comply with industry standards and regularly update our security measures to protect your information.

q7.question: Can I get analytics on my menu performance?
q7.answer: Yes! Our analytics dashboard provides insights into popular dishes, customer preferences, and menu performance. Track which items are most viewed and help optimize your offerings.

q8.question: What if I need help or support?
q8.answer: We're here to help! Our support team is available via email, chat, and phone. We also provide comprehensive documentation, video tutorials, and regular webinars to help you get the most out of Menu Crafter.
